item.title: 美国邮政将推迟处理网络整合计划
item.description: 美国邮政总局局长路易斯-德乔伊（Louis DeJoy）同意暂停进一步整合邮政服务处理网络的计划，因为两党参议员团体对邮件投递的影响表示担忧。【原文：U.S. Postmaster General Louis DeJoy has agreed to pause planned further consolidation of the postal service's processing network after a bipartisan group of senators raised concerns about the impact on mail deliveries.】

item.title: 彭博社报道：大众汽车探索出售卡车制造商特拉托公司股票
item.description: 彭博新闻社周一援引知情人士的话报道称，大众汽车正在探索出售其重型卡车制造部门 Traton SE 价值多达 10 亿欧元（10.8 亿美元）的股票。【原文：Volkswagen is exploring the sale of as much as 1 billion euros ($1.08 billion) worth of stock in its heavy truckmaking arm Traton SE , Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，卡夫亨氏正在探索出售奥斯卡-梅耶业务
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一援引知情人士的话报道，卡夫亨氏正在探讨出售旗下的奥斯卡-梅耶肉类业务，价格可能在 30 亿至 50 亿美元之间。【原文：Kraft Heinz is exploring a sale of its Oscar Mayer meats business that could fetch anything between $3 billion to $5 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美联储研究显示，价格压力不应归咎于企业贪婪
item.description: 根据旧金山联邦储备银行经济学家周一发表的研究报告，企业哄抬物价并不是美国通货膨胀的主要驱动因素。【原文：Corporate price gouging has not been a primary driver of U.S. inflation, according to research published on Monday by economists at the Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，苹果将在美国以外地区销售 Vision Pro 头戴式耳机
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一报道，苹果公司正准备在美国以外的地区销售其 Vision Pro 混合现实头盔，以刺激市场对其多年来最昂贵的赌注的需求。【原文：Apple is gearing up to sell its Vision Pro mixed-reality headset outside the United States, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, in a bid to invigorate demand for its most expensive bet in years.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，Meta 公司正在探索带摄像头的人工智能辅助耳塞
item.description: 据 The Information 周一援引熟悉内情的员工的话报道，Meta Platforms 公司正在探索制造由人工智能驱动的带摄像头的耳机。【原文：Meta Platforms is exploring making earphones powered by artificial intelligence with cameras, The Information reported on Monday citing employees familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 伊利诺伊州财政部长敦促埃克森股东投票反对首席执行官伍兹
item.description: 周一的一份文件显示，在埃克森美孚对两名股东提起诉讼之际，伊利诺伊州财政部长敦促埃克森美孚股东投票反对其执行董事长兼首席执行官达伦-伍兹（Darren Woods）的当选。【原文：The Illinois state treasurer has urged Exxon Mobil shareholders to vote against the election of Executive Chair and CEO Darren Woods, as the oil major pursues a lawsuit against two shareholders, a filing showed on Monday.】

item.title: 特斯拉就工厂工人性骚扰诉讼达成和解
item.description: 特斯拉已就一名前工厂员工的诉讼达成和解，该员工称自己因投诉严重的性骚扰而被解雇，而这家电动汽车制造商还面临着其他一系列指控工作场所性别和种族歧视的案件。【原文：Tesla has settled a lawsuit by a former factory employee who says she was fired for complaining about severe sexual harassment, as the electric carmaker faces a series of other cases alleging workplace sex and race discrimination.】

item.title: 梅琳达-盖茨卸任比尔及梅琳达-盖茨基金会联合主席一职
item.description: 梅琳达-弗伦奇-盖茨（Melinda French Gates）周一表示，她将卸任比尔-盖茨基金会（Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation）联合主席一职。【原文：Melinda French Gates said on Monday she is stepping down as co-chair of the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation.】

item.title: 阿根廷 4 月份月通胀率重回个位数
item.description: 据路透社调查的分析师估计，由于阿根廷经济停滞不前，物价上涨逐渐放缓，4 月份阿根廷的月通胀率可能在半年来首次回落到个位数。【原文：Argentina's monthly inflation rate likely dipped back into single digits for the first time in half a year in April, analysts polled by Reuters estimated, amid a gradual slowdown in price rises as the country's economy stalls.】

item.title: 耶伦称中国可能对美国关税行动做出回应
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）周一表示，在美国采取任何关税行动后，中国可能会做出重大反应。【原文：The United States could see a significant response from China following any U.S. tariff actions, U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said on Monday ahead of expected new tariffs targeting certain sectors this week.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，沃尔格林为博姿英国连锁店联系潜在买家
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一报道，沃尔格林博姿联盟（Walgreens Boots Alliance）正在联系潜在买家出售其位于英国的博姿（Boots）连锁药店，这是沃尔格林博姿联盟分离该部门的第二次尝试，使其股价上涨了近 5%。【原文：Walgreens Boots Alliance is in the process of contacting potential buyers to sell its UK-based Boots drugstore chain in a second attempt at separating the unit, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, sending its shares up nearly 5%.】

item.title: 纽约联储调查发现，普遍预期通胀率会上升
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行周一发布的一份报告显示，美国人上个月对未来几年普遍较高的通胀压力和房价加速上涨做好了准备。【原文：Americans last month braced for generally higher inflation pressures over the next few years and accelerating home price increases, according to a report released on Monday by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York.】

item.title: 麦当劳被举报食品问题后正与中国监管机构合作
item.description: 麦当劳周一在其中文网站上表示，麦当劳正积极配合中国地方市场监管部门调查核实食品问题相关事宜。【原文：McDonald's is actively cooperating with the Chinese local market regulator to investigate and verify matters related to food issues, the company said on its Chinese website on Monday.】

item.title: 各大航空公司就收费披露规定起诉拜登政府
item.description: 美国各大航空公司正在起诉美国交通部，控告其要求预先披露航空公司费用的新规定。【原文：Major U.S. airlines are suing the U.S. Transportation Department over a new rule requiring upfront disclosure of airline fees.】

item.title: 近三分之二的经济学家表示美联储将于 9 月降息
item.description: 路透社（Reuters）调查显示，绝大多数经济学家连续第二个月普遍上调了通胀预期，美国联邦储备委员会（Federal Reserve）今年将从 9 月份开始两次下调关键利率。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve will cut its key interest rate twice this year, starting in September, according to a stronger majority of economists polled by Reuters who broadly raised their inflation forecasts for a second consecutive month.】

item.title: 马斯克的 SpaceX 公司在得克萨斯州的建设速度很快，但支付账单的速度却很慢
item.description: 随着亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的太空企业在整个 "孤星州 "迅速扩展其火箭和卫星业务，SpaceX 公司正在德克萨斯州农村地区建造发射设施、办公楼甚至购物中心。【原文：SpaceX is building launch facilities, office buildings and even a shopping center in rural Texas, as billionaire Elon Musk's space venture rapidly expands its rocket and satellite business across the Lone Star state.】

item.title: 苹果公司在新泽西零售店击败工会运动
item.description: 新泽西州一家零售店的苹果公司员工投票反对加入工会，这可能会抑制该科技巨头在全国范围内组织员工的势头。【原文：Apple employees at a New Jersey retail store have voted against joining a union, potentially stifling momentum for a push to organize the tech giant's workforce nationwide.】

item.title: 阿联酋发布新的人工智能模型，与大型科技公司竞争
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国的一家政府研究所周一发布了一个新的开源 GenAI 模型，该模型可与大型科技公司的模型相媲美。【原文：A government research institute in the United Arab Emirates on Monday released a new open source GenAI model, which could rival the ones from big technology companies.】

item.title: 巴西 Azul 航空公司第一季度亏损收窄
item.description: 巴西航空公司Azul周一报告称，随着巴西航空旅行需求的回升，该公司第一季度的亏损额缩小至3.242亿雷亚尔（约合6286万美元）。【原文：Brazilian airline Azul's losses narrowed in the first quarter to 324.2 million reais ($62.86 million), it reported on Monday, as demand for air travel in the country picked up.】

item.title: 蒂姆-德雷珀（Tim Draper）牵头为比特币借贷背后的六名员工初创公司筹资 350 万美元
item.description: Zest Protocol 是一家只有六名员工的比特币借贷初创公司，在亿万富翁投资者蒂姆-德雷珀（Tim Draper）领投的一轮融资中获得了 350 万美元。【原文：Zest Protocol, a bitcoin lending startup with just six employees, has secured $3.5 million in a funding round led by billionaire investor Tim Draper.】

item.title: 美联储杰斐逊指出通信方面的挑战
item.description: 美联储副主席菲利普-杰斐逊（Phillip Jefferson）周一表示，尽管中央银行与公众进行清晰的沟通非常重要，但有时这些沟通也会变得模糊不清。【原文：Federal Reserve Vice-chair Phillip Jefferson said Monday that while it is important for a central bank to communicate clearly with the public, there are times when those communications can get muddled.】

item.title: 必和必拓称英美资源集团拒绝了修订提案
item.description: 必和必拓集团周一称，英美资源集团拒绝了修订后的收购要约。【原文：BHP Group said on Monday that Anglo American had rejected a revised buyout offer.】

item.title: 耶伦将在弗吉尼亚州乡村之行中吹捧宽带投资
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）将于周一前往弗吉尼亚州斯塔福德县，参观一个由 1.9 万亿美元 COVID 时代的 "美国救援计划"（American Rescue Plan）资助的宽带基础设施项目，并强调投资农村地区的重要性。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen will travel to Stafford County, Virginia on Monday to tour a broadband infrastructure project funded by the $1.9 trillion COVID-era American Rescue Plan and underscore the importance of investing in rural areas.】

item.title: 首席执行官瑞银将把节省的 130 亿美元成本中的一部分再投资于改进流程
item.description: 瑞银集团首席执行官塞尔吉奥-埃尔莫蒂（Sergio Ermotti）周一表示，在收购瑞士信贷后，瑞银将把计划节省的 130 亿美元成本中的一部分重新投入到加强银行流程和业务上。【原文：UBS will reinvest part of $13 billion in planned cost savings on making the bank's processes and businesses stronger following the takeover of Credit Suisse, UBS chief executive Sergio Ermotti said on Monday.】

item.title: 咆哮的凯蒂猫》停播三年后回归，GameStop 跳涨
item.description: 2021 年，曾在网上发帖引发电子游戏零售商交易狂潮的社交媒体人物 "咆哮的凯蒂猫 "时隔三年重返 X.com，此后 GameStop 股价在周一盘前交易中大涨 40%。【原文：Shares of GameStop jumped 40% in premarket trading on Monday after social media persona "Roaring Kitty," whose online posts had sparked a trading frenzy in the videogame retailer in 2021, returned on X.com after three years.】

item.title: 中国本周将启动1万亿元刺激性债券发行
item.description: 中国财政部周一表示，将于本周开始销售期待已久的长期特别国债，中国政府希望这将有助于刺激疲软经济中的关键部门。【原文：China's finance ministry said on Monday it would start the long-awaited sales of long-term special treasury bonds that Beijing hopes will help stimulate key sectors of a flagging economy this week.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，英特尔接近与阿波罗达成 110 亿美元的爱尔兰合作协议
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一报道，英特尔正在就一项交易进行深入谈判，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）将提供超过 110 亿美元的资金，帮助英特尔在爱尔兰建立芯片工厂。【原文：Intel is in advanced talks for a transaction in which Apollo Global Management would supply more than $11 billion to help build a chip plant in Ireland, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday.】

item.title: J&J 公司将出售分拆后的 Kenvue 公司的全部股份
item.description: 强生公司（Johnson & Johnson）在周一提交的一份文件中表示，将以债转股的方式出售其分拆公司 Kenvue 的全部 1.823 亿股股票。【原文：Johnson & Johnson will sell all its 182.3 million shares in its spun-off company Kenvue in a stock offering in a debt-for-equity exchange, the consumer health product firm said in a filing on Monday.】

item.title: 比尔-黄（Bill Hwang）就价值 360 亿美元的 Archegos 倒闭案开庭陈述
item.description: 周一，曼哈顿联邦法院就黄成国（Sung Kook "Bill" Hwang）因其价值 360 亿美元的基金 Archegos Capital Management 于 2021 年倒闭而受到的指控开庭审理。【原文：The trial of Sung Kook "Bill" Hwang kicks off with opening statements in Manhattan federal court on Monday on charges stemming from the 2021 collapse of his $36 billion fund Archegos Capital Management.】
